page.title: 09THE MARINE LAKE,NEW PLANS.
page.content: The Marine Lake is ninety years old.It is just over 1000m long and 155m wide.Because of its age and position Wirral Borough Council have decided to replace and extend the existing structure to twice its present width new slipways and car parking will also be provided. The money for most of this project is coming from the E.E.C.,the Sports Council,the Tourist Board and the Ministry of Agriculture. It is hoped that the work will begin early in 1986 and that the new lake will be able to cater for new water sports. There has been considerable controversy about the plans as many conservationists feel concerned about the feeding grounds of the many birds that use the river estuary.
